name: PlayStation Store PSP License File
summary: Learn about .XPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XPD files are acquired by the PlayStation Network Downloader (PSND) when downloading files from the PlayStation Store for PSP.

description: An XPD file is a webpage file created from an XML document. More often, this is generated through an XSLT transformation. The XPD file format specifications are available on W3 that define a way to increase interoperability of multi-process XML applications. The XML Pipeline Language defines the processing relationships between XML resources.

An XPD file is a license file downloaded alongside Sony PlayStation Store content. It is used for Digital Rights Management (DRM) and is required to transfer games and other downloaded files to a PlayStation Portable (PSP).
